//Problem code: IITI13
#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long n,a[100000],t;
    char ch;
    string s;
    scanf("%ld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%ld",&n);
        //scanf("%s",s);
        cin>>s;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            scanf("%ld",&a[i]);

         for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
         {
            ch=s[a[i]-1];
            s[a[i]-1] = s[i];
            s[i]=ch;
         }
        //printf("%s\n",s);
        cout<<s<<"\n";
    }
return 0;
}
